articles.title: Ukraine says it downed Russian hypersonic missile with U.S. Patriot defense system - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Ukraine's air force claimed Saturday to have downed a Russian hypersonic missile over Kyiv using newly acquired American Patriot defense systems, the first known time the country has been able to intercept one of Moscow's most modern missiles.
